message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can negotiate from here.
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more this time
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. No more negotiations needed!
You're getting desperate, but I'll still take a bit more
I'm not getting desperate, but I'm willing to compromise. Take a slightly smaller share and we can wrap this up.
You're not willing to give me enough, so I'll take what I can get
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and end this. I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time.
